document.full_text: texas governor rick perry on thursday blasted the obama administration for not responding to an april 16 request for a disaster declaration for the parched lone star state, where wildfires have scorched nearly 2 million acres this year.
document.title: texas governor: washington taking care of alabama, not texas
lines_and_colors: texas governor rick perry on thursday blasted the obama administration for not responding to an april 16 request for a disaster declaration for the parched lone star state, where wildfires have scorched nearly 2 million acres this year.
